labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.system_settings: Windows 10 Pro x64, Discord Canary, latest update 27 April
data.actual_result: A visually broken color picker box
data.short_description: Role Color Picker Box Visually Glitches
data.steps_to_repro: - Use the redesigned settings - Go to a role and click on the color picker to choose a custom color - Notice the color picker box cutting off into the background
